aspect.name: Aspect of Combustion
aspect.description: Modifies Passive. Hitting an enemy with a Basic Attack ignites them dealing 3 (+3% Strength) Magical Damage over 3s and stacking 5 times. Flame Wave and Rain of Fire consume the ignite dealing 30 (+80% Strength) Magical Damage. Rain of Fire deals reduced damage when consuming ignites. Critical Strikes apply 2 stacks of ignite.
aspect.impact: Transforms into auto-attack focused mage with enhanced basic attack synergy

passive.name: Combustion
passive.description: Hitting an enemy with a Basic Attack provides 1 stack of Combustion. Hitting an enemy God provides 2. At 4 stacks, Agni's next Flame Wave or Rain Fire ability cast will ignite all enemies hit, dealing Magical Damage over time (5 + 6% Intelligence every 0.5s for 3s). When Agni kills an enemy God, he goes on a Hot Streak. When on a Hot Streak, Combustion is fully charged and using Flame Wave or Rain Fire does not consume Combustion.

ability_1.name: Noxious Fumes
ability_1.description: Agni summons a cloud of noxious fumes at a target location. The fumes deal Magical Damage every second to enemies within it. Hitting the fumes with any of Agni's other abilities detonates the gas, Stunning enemies in the area and dealing additional Magical Damage.

ability_2.name: Flame Wave
ability_2.description: Agni summons a wave of fire in front of him, dealing Magical Damage to all enemies it hits. This ability will ignite Noxious Fumes.

ability_3.name: Path of Flames
ability_3.description: Agni dashes forward, leaving a trail of fire behind him for 3s. Enemies passing over the trail take Magical Damage every 0.5s for 2s. Agni is Displacement Immune while dashing.

ability_4.name: Rain Fire
ability_4.description: Agni summons a meteor to strike a target location, dealing Magical Damage. Agni stores up to 3 meteors. This ability will ignite Noxious Fumes.

passive.name: The Scales
passive.description: Anubis gains bonus Lifesteal, Physical Protection, and Magical Protection. These bonuses increase as his health declines (1 stack per 10% missing health, max 8 stacks).

ability_1.name: Plague Of Locusts
ability_1.description: Anubis channels a cone of locusts, dealing Magical Damage every 0.25s for 2.5s (12 ticks total). Anubis is Displacement Immune and moves at reduced Movement Speed while channeling.

ability_2.name: Mummify
ability_2.description: Anubis fires a bandage projectile, dealing Magical Damage and Stunning the first enemy god hit. The projectile ignores minions and stops on walls.

ability_3.name: Grasping Hands
ability_3.description: Anubis summons hands from the underworld in a target area, dealing Magical Damage every 0.375s for 1.5s (4 ticks total) and Slowing enemies within.

ability_4.name: Death Gaze
ability_4.description: Anubis channels a piercing gaze in a line, dealing an initial burst of Magical Damage, then dealing Magical Damage every 0.1s for 2.4s (24 ticks total). Anubis is CC Immune but Rooted while channeling.

Apollo.name: Apollo
assault_weaknesses: Ultimate less useful in single lane

aspect.name: Aspect of Harmony
aspect.description: Modifies Passive and Abilities. Audacity now grants free So Beautiful casts but no Attack Speed. Buffing an ally grants an Audacity stack. So Beautiful deals 60 (+15% ItemHealth) Physical Damage, reduces enemy Attack Speed, and buffs nearby ally Attack Speed on first god/boss hit. Serenade also grants nearby allies a Health shield for 5s.
aspect.impact: Transforms into support-oriented hunter with team utility focus

passive.name: Audacity
passive.description: Gain a stack of Audacity for each successful Basic Attack on any enemy and for each successful damaging ability on Enemy gods. At 10 stacks, Apollo gains 100% Attack Speed and Increased Basic Attack Projectile Speed for his next 5 Basic Attacks.

ability_1.name: So Beautiful
ability_1.description: Apollo strums a single chord on his lyre. It's so beautiful it damages all enemies in a line.

ability_2.name: Serenade
ability_2.description: Apollo mesmerizes all nearby enemies and gains additional Physical and Magical Protections for 5s. Any damage breaks the Mesmerize.

ability_3.name: The Moves
ability_3.description: Apollo dashes forward dealing Physical Damage, knocking aside enemies. At the end of the dash, nearby allies gain a Movement Speed buff for 5s, and nearby enemies are Slowed by the same amount.

ability_4.name: Across The Sky
ability_4.description: Apollo rides his chariot across the sky, choosing when to land. When descending, he deals Physical Damage every 0.15s for 0.6s, knocking back enemies on the last tick. Up to 2 allies can join the chariot ride.

aspect.name: Aspect of Reverberation
aspect.description: Modifies Ability 2 (Call To Arms). Call To Arms no longer grants Protections, Regen, or affects allies. Instead, Ares gains Basic Attack Damage and empowers his Shield for his next Basic Attack. Damaging enemy gods increases the duration and effects of this buff.
aspect.impact: Transforms into more selfish damage-focused guardian

passive.name: Blessed Armaments
passive.description: Ares provides an aura granting Strength (1 per Level) and Intelligence (1 per Level) to himself. Allies gain 50% of this. Building Protections from items increases the Strength Aura by 8-12.5% of those protections.

ability_1.name: Shackles
ability_1.description: Ares fires a chain projectile that deals initial Magical Damage and Slows the first enemy god hit. He can refire this ability up to two more times. Shackled gods are Crippled for 4s, take repeating Magical Damage per tick, and Ares gains 15% Movement Speed per shackled god.

ability_2.name: Call To Arms
ability_2.description: Ares and nearby allied gods gain Physical and Magical Protections and bonus Basic Attack Damage. Ares gains bonus Health Regen. Damaging enemy gods increases the duration and effects of this buff.

ability_3.name: Searing Flesh
ability_3.description: Ares channels flames from his shield, dealing repeating Magical Damage to enemies in front of him for up to 2.5s. Deals bonus damage based on enemies' maximum Health. Ares is Displacement Immune and can fire Shackles while channeling.

ability_4.name: No Escape
ability_4.description: Ares throws chains at all enemy gods in a radius. After 2.5s, he pulls all chained gods to him, dealing Magical Damage and Stunning them. Ares is CC Immune and gains Damage Mitigation while channeling.

aspect.name: Aspect of Thermotherapy
aspect.description: Transforms damage abilities into healing abilities, converting Ra from a damage mage into a dedicated healer.
aspect.impact: Becomes pure support healer with enhanced healing capabilities

passive.name: Speed of Light
passive.description: Ra gains increased Movement Speed and reduced ability cooldowns when he successfully hits enemy gods with his abilities.

ability_1.name: Celestial Beam
ability_1.description: Ra summons a moving beam of intense light from the sky, doing damage to anyone caught under the beam.

ability_2.name: Divine Light
ability_2.description: Light starts to emanate from Ra, Slowing enemies. After a short time the light explodes, doing damage and Blinding all nearby enemies.

ability_3.name: Solar Blessing
ability_3.description: Ra summons a pillar of blessed light. Allies inside the blessing heal every second, while enemies are damaged every second.

ability_4.name: Searing Pain
ability_4.description: Ra calls on the power of the sun to decimate his foes in an extreme long range attack.

passive.name: Stance Attunement
passive.description: Hel gains increased MP5 and reduced cooldowns when she switches stances. She also gains protections based on her current stance.

ability_1_light.name: Restoration
ability_1_light.description: Hel heals herself and nearby allied gods.

ability_1_dark.name: Decay
ability_1_dark.description: Hel deals damage to all nearby enemies and heals herself for a percentage of damage dealt.

ability_2_light.name: Cleanse
ability_2_light.description: Hel cleanses all debuffs from herself and nearby allies, and provides immunity to new debuffs for a short time.

ability_2_dark.name: Hinder
ability_2_dark.description: Hel deals damage to all nearby enemies and slows them.

ability_3_light.name: Inspire
ability_3_light.description: Hel grants herself and nearby allies increased movement speed and magical power.

ability_3_dark.name: Repulse
ability_3_dark.description: Hel deals damage in a line and knocks back all enemies hit.

ability_4.name: Switch Stances
ability_4.description: Hel switches between Light and Dark stances, changing her abilities and gaining different benefits.

passive.name: Overcharge
passive.description: Zeus gains increased damage on his abilities when he has charges built up from his basic attacks and abilities.

ability_1.name: Chain Lightning
ability_1.description: Zeus fires a bolt of lightning that chains between enemies, dealing increasing damage with each bounce.

ability_2.name: Aegis Assault
ability_2.description: Zeus throws his shield forward, dealing damage and slowing enemies. The shield returns to Zeus, dealing damage again.

ability_3.name: Detonate Charge
ability_3.description: Zeus detonates all charges on enemies, dealing damage based on the number of charges.

ability_4.name: Lightning Storm
ability_4.description: Zeus conjures a lightning storm at a target location, dealing damage over time to all enemies in the area.

passive.name: Bees!
passive.description: Ah Muzen Cab's abilities apply Bees to enemies, dealing damage over time and reducing healing.

ability_1.name: Hive
ability_1.description: Ah Muzen Cab places a hive that provides attack speed and movement speed to him when nearby. Hives also heal Ah Muzen Cab over time.

ability_2.name: Swarm
ability_2.description: Ah Muzen Cab summons a swarm of bees that travel in a line, dealing damage and applying Bees to all enemies hit.

ability_3.name: Honey
ability_3.description: Ah Muzen Cab creates a pool of honey that slows enemies and increases his movement speed when he walks through it.

ability_4.name: Stinger
ability_4.description: Ah Muzen Cab fires his stinger in a line, dealing damage and stunning the first enemy god hit. If the stinger kills an enemy, it returns to Ah Muzen Cab and the cooldown is reset.

S+.description: Must not reroll - Healers and game-changing gods

A.description: Strong performers with good assault utility

support_oriented.effect: Spreads weapon effects to allies, reducing personal damage
Converts damage abilities to healing/support functions
Applies buffs to allies while adding CC

damage_oriented.effect: Enhances personal damage over team support
Converts CC tank into area damage dealer
